scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:demo
scripts.build:lib: ng build ng-inbo && npm run build-schematics
scripts.prerelease:check: npm run build:lib && echo 'Build successful - ready for release'
scripts.release: npm run prerelease:check && cd projects/ng-inbo && standard-version && cd ../.. && npm run build:lib && git push --follow-tags && npm run create-github-release && cd dist/ng-inbo && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run prerelease:check && cd projects/ng-inbo && standard-version --release-as minor && cd ../.. && npm run build:lib && git push --follow-tags && npm run create-github-release && cd dist/ng-inbo && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run prerelease:check && cd projects/ng-inbo && standard-version --release-as major && cd ../.. && npm run build:lib && git push --follow-tags && npm run create-github-release && cd dist/ng-inbo && npm publish
scripts.sync-versions: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const libPkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('projects/ng-inbo/package.json')); const rootPkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json')); rootPkg.version=libPkg.version; fs.writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify(rootPkg, null, 2));"
